attributes.action: Censure BT and associated organisations unless Broadband networks are updated to match our european neighbours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Telecom and their competition have a responsibility to not only maintain the telecoms systems of Great Britain, but to upgrade them in a full and timely manner. Without this, we as a country will start to lose critical business revenue as companies move their data centres overseas.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/fibretothehome/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
